channel.title: Snape grass
channel.description:
So I'm getting a sudden urge to start playing my pure again..and it's really hurting my head. But I was just wondering, does the snape grass method still work? If not what methods do work?[Pure-friendly]
And pure ess?
Thanks

item.title: Snape grass
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

the banana method wouldnt work anymore,
they changed the way you can buy from shops.
i think even if you hop worlds that theyre still maxed :s

Read full topic

item.title: Snape grass
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:14, topic:311802”]snape married harry[/quote]proffesor snape marrieddd harry potterr

that's such a shit method and too time consuming. i suggest you buy bananas from port whatever it was, i dont remember (near khazard) for 3gp each was it? and sell on ge for 50-60 each. just use rsbot: i made 4m like that easily when i played
why didnt you go higher

Read full topic

item.title: Snape grass
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

unicorns
in the wild near stealing creations is alot of black unicorns
horns sell about 1.2k ea if i remember and are always in demand as theyre an ingredient to potions.

if you have some money already and an okay herblore lvl you can make unf. ranarr pots.

if you have a high summoning level you can buy pyrelord pouches or rock lobster pouches and trade them for shards (this only sometimes works, you need to be able to buy the pouches at low prices)

another method is buying out the cream and cheese and what not from the store downstairs in lumby castle and selling them for more on ge (this takes ages and isnt nearly as effective as other methods stated)

Read full topic

item.title: Snape grass
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Anything that deals with buying from a shop for a low price and selling it on the Grand Exchange won’t work anymore, since the update to the shops limits the amount of an item you can buy. Buying water vials from ardougne used to work too, but now you can only do it for like 1k vials and then wait for a few hours. Snape grass is 475gp each, so yes it would work.

Read full topic

item.title: Snape grass
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“nohope, post:8, topic:311802”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=408240.msg3014728#msg3014728 date=1257098434]

[quote author=nohope link=topic=408240.msg3014598#msg3014598 date=1257094029]

[quote author=Ollie link=topic=408240.msg3014320#msg3014320 date=1257082421]
soft clay is good.

also collecting air talismans and dropping them and claiming more from the duke can get you about 300k gp/h.

collect 27 talismans, go to bank, withdraw them noted, go back to the duke, drop them, speak to him again and repeat until you feel you have enough talismans.

p.s. remember to pickup the noted talismans every 5-10 speaks to the duke as you dont want them to disappear!
[/quote]IM BOUT 2 DO THAT!! TY
[/quote]that’s such a shit method and too time consuming. i suggest you buy bananas from port whatever it was, i dont remember (near khazard) for 3gp each was it? and sell on ge for 50-60 each. just use rsbot: i made 4m like that easily when i played
[/quote]is that free to play?[/quote]no it isnt but if you cant even get memb then i suggest you quit

Read full topic

sell to the GE
